definition[0]: a large net that is placed below an acrobat who is performing high above the ground, in order to catch them if they fall
definition[1]: a system or arrangement that exists to help you if you have serious problems or get into a difficult situation
example[0]: State support should provide a safety net for the very poor.
definition[2]: actions by a government to help companies and financial institutions with financial difficulties
example[1]: In the event of a securities trading firmâ€™s collapse, a regulatory safety net guards against possible risks.
